events.message: I reported a collision involving my vehicle last night; the car was severely damaged in the accident.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after initial review of the details and accident report.
An agent has been assigned to handle my auto claim and assist me with required next steps.
Received official acknowledgment of my accident claim and confirmation that it is being processed.
The insurance company requested additional documents including the police report, photos, and repair estimates.
Submitted all requested documents such as the police report and repair bills to support my vehicle damage claim.
The claim investigation phase has started, including a review of the accident circumstances and damage appraisal.
The investigation concluded with verified accident details and damage assessment reports finalized.
Received a proposed settlement offer from the insurer covering repair costs and rental car expenses.
Provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of my auto insurance claim.
The claim has officially been approved; I was informed that the settlement will be finalized shortly.
Payment for my vehicle repairs was issued today and the funds should reflect in my account within two days.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following payment and confirmation of repair completion.
